mapper.select: SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_title, portfolio_userId, portfolio_category_main, portfolio_category_sub, portfolio_term, portfolio_price, portfolio_rating, portfolio_regDate FROM portfolio ORDER BY portfolio_id DESC
select portfolio_category_main, ROUND(COUNT(*) * 100 / sum(count(*)) over(), 1) AS score from portfolio group by portfolio_category_main ORDER by score DESC
SELECT portfolio_category_main, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM portfolio GROUP BY portfolio_category_main
